products_and_services.title: Landing Zone Review, Design, and Implementation
products_and_services.description: Comprehensive review, design, and implementation of AWS Landing Zones tailored to your organization's needs.
key_deliverables: Documentation of Landing Zone setup and configurations

products_and_services.title: DevOps Engineering
products_and_services.description: End-to-end DevOps engineering services to streamline software development, testing, and deployment processes. In general, can be used to address any technical HRI or MRI

products_and_services.title: DevOps Maturity Assessment
products_and_services.description: Assessment of your organization's current DevOps practices and maturity level, along with recommendations for improvement.
key_deliverables: Metrics and KPIs for tracking progress

products_and_services.title: FinOps Review
products_and_services.description: Review and optimization of your organization's cloud spending to maximize cost efficiency and ROI.

products_and_services.title: Application Modernisation
products_and_services.description: Modernization of legacy applications for improved performance, scalability, and cost-effectiveness in the cloud.
key_deliverables: Deployment and testing of modernized applications

products_and_services.title: Cloud Migrations
products_and_services.description: Planning, execution, and management of cloud migrations for seamless transition to AWS.

products_and_services.title: Managed Cloud Services
products_and_services.description: Ongoing management and optimization of your AWS cloud environment to ensure performance, security, and cost-efficiency.

products_and_services.title: Serverless / Microservice Development
products_and_services.description: Design and development of serverless architectures and microservices for scalable and resilient applications.

products_and_services.title: Cloud Strategy and Governance Advisory
products_and_services.description: Strategic guidance and governance framework development for effective management of AWS cloud resources.

products_and_services.title: GenAI Consulting
products_and_services.description: Consulting services leveraging AI and machine learning technologies to drive innovation and business growth.
